# Swimming and Aquatic Adventures
## Overview
**Swimming and Aquatic Adventures** 

Barring the use of magic, swimming is the main way to travel in an aquatic adventure. However, the [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] skill was written from the perspective of a primarily land-based campaign.
